wherefore I would exhort you that ye deny not the power of God; for he worketh by power, <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note7b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>according</span> to the faith of the children of men, the same today and tomorrow, and forever.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358862" id="p8"><span class="verse-number">8 </span>And again, I exhort you, my brethren, that ye deny not the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note8a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>gifts</span> of God, for they are many; and they come from the same God. And there are <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note8b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>different</span> ways that these gifts are administered; but it is the same God who worketh all in all; and they are given by the manifestations of the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note8c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>Spirit</span> of God unto men, to profit them.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358863" id="p9"><span class="verse-number">9 </span><span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note9a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>For</span> behold, to one is given by the Spirit of God, that he may <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note9b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>teach</span> the word of wisdom;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358864" id="p10"><span class="verse-number">10 </span>And to another, that he may <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note10a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>teach</span> the word of <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note10b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>knowledge</span> by the same Spirit;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358865" id="p11"><span class="verse-number">11 </span>And to another, exceedingly great <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note11a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>faith</span>; and to another, the gifts of <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note11b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>healing</span> by the same Spirit;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358866" id="p12"><span class="verse-number">12 </span>And again, to another, that he may work mighty <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note12a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>miracles</span>;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358867" id="p13"><span class="verse-number">13 </span>And again, to another, that he may prophesy concerning all things;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358868" id="p14"><span class="verse-number">14 </span>And again, to another, the beholding of angels and ministering spirits;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358869" id="p15"><span class="verse-number">15 </span>And again, to another, all kinds of tongues;</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358870" id="p16"><span class="verse-number">16 </span>And again, to another, the interpretation of <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note16a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>languages</span> and of divers kinds of tongues.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358871" id="p17"><span class="verse-number">17 </span>And all these gifts come by the Spirit of Christ; and they come unto every man severally, according as he will.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358872" id="p18"><span class="verse-number">18 </span>And I would exhort you, my beloved brethren, that ye remember that <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note18a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>every</span> good <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note18b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>gift</span> cometh of Christ.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358873" id="p19"><span class="verse-number">19 </span>And I would exhort you, my beloved brethren, that ye remember that he is the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note19a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>same</span> yesterday, today, and forever, and that all these gifts of which I have spoken, which are spiritual, never will be done away, even as long as the world shall stand, only according to the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note19b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>unbelief</span> of the children of men.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358874" id="p20"><span class="verse-number">20 </span>Wherefore, there must be <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note20a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>faith</span>; and if there must be faith there must also be hope; and if there must be hope there must also be charity.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358875" id="p21"><span class="verse-number">21 </span>And except ye have <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note21a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>charity</span> ye can in nowise be saved in the kingdom of God; neither can ye be saved in the kingdom of God if ye have not faith; neither can ye if ye have no hope.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358876" id="p22"><span class="verse-number">22 </span>And if ye have no hope ye must needs be in <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note22a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>despair</span>; and despair cometh because of iniquity.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358877" id="p23"><span class="verse-number">23 </span>And Christ truly said unto our fathers: <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note23a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>If</span> ye have faith ye can do all things which are expedient unto me.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358878" id="p24"><span class="verse-number">24 </span>And now I speak unto all the ends of the earth—that if the day cometh that the power and gifts of God shall be done away among you, it shall be <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note24a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>because</span> of <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note24b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>unbelief</span>.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358879" id="p25"><span class="verse-number">25 </span>And wo be unto the children of men if this be the case; for there shall be <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note25a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>none</span> that doeth good among you, no not one. For if there <span class="page-break" data-page="531"></span>be one among you that doeth good, he shall work by the power and gifts of God.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358880" id="p26"><span class="verse-number">26 </span>And wo unto them who shall do these things away and die, for they <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note26a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>die</span> in their <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note26b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>sins</span>, and they cannot be saved in the kingdom of God; and I speak it according to the words of Christ; and I lie not.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358881" id="p27"><span class="verse-number">27 </span>And I exhort you to remember these things; for the time speedily cometh that ye shall know that I lie not, for ye shall see me at the bar of God; and the Lord God will say unto you: Did I not declare my <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note27a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>words</span> unto you, which were written by this man, like as one <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note27b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>crying</span> from the dead, yea, even as one speaking out of the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note27c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>dust</span>?</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358882" id="p28"><span class="verse-number">28 </span>I declare these things unto the fulfilling of the prophecies. And behold, they shall proceed forth out of the mouth of the everlasting God; and his word shall <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note28a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>hiss</span> forth from generation to generation.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358883" id="p29"><span class="verse-number">29 </span>And God shall show unto you, that that which I have written is <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note29a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>true</span>.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358884" id="p30"><span class="verse-number">30 </span>And again I would exhort you that ye would <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note30a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>come</span> unto Christ, and lay hold upon every good <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note30b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>gift</span>, and <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note30c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>touch not</span> the evil gift, nor the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note30d"><sup class="marker">d</sup>unclean thing</span>.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358885" id="p31"><span class="verse-number">31 </span>And <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note31a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>awake</span>, and arise from the dust, O Jerusalem; yea, and put on thy beautiful garments, O daughter of <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note31b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>Zion</span>; and <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note31c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>strengthen</span> thy <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note31d"><sup class="marker">d</sup>stakes</span> and enlarge thy borders forever, that thou mayest <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note31e"><sup class="marker">e</sup>no more</span> be confounded, that the covenants of the Eternal Father which he hath made unto thee, O house of Israel, may be fulfilled.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358886" id="p32"><span class="verse-number">32 </span>Yea, <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note32a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>come</span> unto Christ, and be <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note32b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>perfected</span> in him, and <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note32c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>deny</span> yourselves of all ungodliness; and if ye shall deny yourselves of all ungodliness, and <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note32d"><sup class="marker">d</sup>love</span> God with all your might, mind and strength, then is his grace sufficient for you, that by his grace ye may be <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note32e"><sup class="marker">e</sup>perfect</span> in Christ; and if by the grace of God ye are perfect in Christ, ye can in nowise deny the power of God.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358887" id="p33"><span class="verse-number">33 </span>And again, if ye by the grace of God are perfect in Christ, and deny not his power, then are ye <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note33a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>sanctified</span> in Christ by the grace of God, through the shedding of the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note33b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>blood</span> of Christ, which is in the covenant of the Father unto the remission of your <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note33c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>sins</span>, that ye become <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note33d"><sup class="marker">d</sup>holy</span>, without spot.</p>^N			<p class="verse" data-aid="128358888" id="p34"><span class="verse-number">34 </span>And now I bid unto all, farewell. I soon go to <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34a"><sup class="marker">a</sup>rest</span> in the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34b"><sup class="marker">b</sup>paradise</span> of God, until my <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34c"><sup class="marker">c</sup>spirit</span> and body shall again <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34d"><sup class="marker">d</sup>reunite</span>, and I am brought forth triumphant through the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34e"><sup class="marker">e</sup>air</span>, to meet you before the <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34f"><sup class="marker">f</sup>pleasing</span> bar of the great <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34g"><sup class="marker">g</sup>Jehovah</span>, the Eternal <span class="study-note-ref" data-ref="note34h"><sup class="marker">h</sup>Judge</span> of both quick and dead. Amen.</p>^N			<div class="closing-block">^N				<p class="closing" data-aid="128358889" id="closing1">The End</p>^N			</div>^N		</div>^N	</body>^N</html>
